articles.author: Nicole Karlis
articles.title: Flu, coronavirus, or all of the above? More unlucky Americans are catching both at the same time - Salon
articles.description: The joint infection of flu and COVID-19 is called "flurona" — but it may not be as bad as it sounds. Here's why

articles.author: Andrew J. Tobias, cleveland.com
articles.title: Matt Dolan’s solemn commemoration of Jan. 6 riots at U.S. Capitol sharply contrasts with rest of GOP U.S. Sen - cleveland.com
articles.description: In contrast to his opponents, who have ignored or downplayed the attack, or criticized the official response to it, Dolan’s statement calls the events an “attack on American democracy, our Constitution and the rule of law.”
articles.content: COLUMBUS, Ohio -- A new statement from state Sen. Matt Dolan commemorating the one-year anniversary of the deadly riot at the U.S. Capitol by Trump supporters last Jan. 6 stands well apart from the r… [+4880 chars]

articles.title: 'We don't know how to leave,' says young tourist caught up in Kazakhstan violence - The Star Online
articles.description: (Reuters) -     Melaniya Pavlova, a 21-year-old Russian-American dual citizen, was visiting Almaty, Kazakhstan, with some friends this week to say goodbye to a friend who was planning a trip to Australia.

articles.title: Brazil greenlights COVID-19 vaccines for young children aged 5-11 - Global Times
articles.description: Brazilian health authorities authorized COVID-19 vaccines for children aged 5 to 11 on Wednesday, as South America's most populous country faces a rapid increase in cases due to holiday gatherings and the arrival of the Omicron variant.
